column5: Programme descriptionAre you ready to confront the challenges of the global climate crisis?Join students from across the globe to tackle the challenges of climate change and create a net-zero-carbon economy and society.With our MSc Carbon Management, you will be able to develop the skills and knowledge to engage critically with climate change debates and challenges for an equitable transition toward a resilient, net zero-carbon future.This interdisciplinary programme is fast-paced and dynamic. Your studies will draw widely on the latest climate change research, along with case studies from Scotland and worldwide.Industry experts and programme alumni also contribute to the discussions and provide guest lectures.
